Uses of Class
com.azure.core.amqp.Retry

  • Packages that use Retry 
    Package Description
    com.azure.core.amqp
    Package containing classes common to AMQP protocol.
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs
    Package containing classes for creating a EventHubClient to perform operations on Azure Event Hubs.

    • Uses of Retry in com.azure.core.amqp

      Subclasses of Retry in com.azure.core.amqp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExponentialRetry
      A policy to govern retrying of messaging operations in which the delay between retries will grow in an exponential manner, allowing more time to recover as the number of retries increases.
      Methods in com.azure.core.amqp that return Retry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Retry Retry.getDefaultRetry()
      Creates a Retry policy that retries failed requests up to 10 times.
      static Retry Retry.getNoRetry()
      Creates a Retry policy that does not retry failed requests.
      Methods in com.azure.core.amqp with parameters of type Retry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<AmqpLink> AmqpSession.createConsumer(String linkName, String entityPath, Duration timeout, Retry retry)
      Creates a new AMQP link that consumes events from the message broker.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<AmqpLink> AmqpSession.createProducer(String linkName, String entityPath, Duration timeout, Retry retry)
      Creates a new AMQP link that publishes events to the message broker.

    • Uses of Retry in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs

      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs that return Retry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Retry EventHubProducerOptions.retry()
      Gets the retry policy used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
      Retry EventHubConsumerOptions.retry()
      Gets the retry policy when receiving events.
      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs with parameters of type Retry 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventHubProducerOptions EventHubProducerOptions.retry(Retry retry)
      Sets the retry policy used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
      EventHubConsumerOptions EventHubConsumerOptions.retry(Retry retry)
      Sets the retry policy used to govern retry attempts for receiving events.
      EventHubClientBuilder EventHubClientBuilder.retry(Retry retry)
      Sets the retry policy for EventHubClient.
